queries: This sign also be made with the Cup handshape and/or with the base of the palm contacting the chin.
nominalLexeme: 1. A round fruit with a smooth skin and firm white flesh. English = apple.
2. Something which grows on a tree or a bush and which contains seeds or a stone covered by a substance that you can eat. Apples, oranges, grapes, and bananas are examples. English = fruit.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: holding an apple for eating.
